projects.title: Enhance your Playlists with Machine Learning: Spotify Automatic Playlist Continuation
projects.description: Recommend songs for a given playlist. This project starts from data collection all the way to model deployment to ensure you have a working model to showcase.

projects.title: COVID-19 Tweet Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: NLP sentiment classification for COVID-19 tweets.

projects.title: PSD lockdown: COVID-19 impact on seismic waves
projects.description: Power spectral density (PSD) is a common methodology to measure the energy of waves. This project focuses on the calculation of PSD of seismic waves in order to measure the impact of culture noise during the COVID-19 pandemic according to 'Global quieting of high-frequency seismic noise due to COVID-19 pandemic lockdown measures' from Lecocq et al. (2020).

projects.title: Dashboard project using React and Material-UI
projects.description: This project is a dashboard that displays data from a database. The dashboard is built using React and Material-UI.

image.alt: Dashboard project using React and Material-UI

projects.title: Interactive Graph Visualization with d3.js (Internal Project)
projects.description: Using d3.js to visualize a graph with a large number of nodes and edges. The graph is interactive and allows users to explore the graph by clicking on nodes and edges.

projects.title: Data visualization and journalism of Ye Shengji's ten-year diary
projects.description: This project is a data journalism project of Ye Shengji's ten-year diary. It includes the visualization and analysis of the data. The project is built using React and d3.js.

image.alt: Data visualization and journalism of Ye Shengji's ten-year diary
